segment.source: The Microsoft Application Virtualization Client Management Console is a snap-in to the Microsoft Management Console.
segment.target: The Microsoft Application Virtualization Client Management Console is a snap-in to the Microsoft Management Console.

segment.source: Administrators and users can use the Application Virtualization Management Console to configure the Desktop Client and Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) and manage applications.
segment.target: Administrators and users can use the Application Virtualization Management Console to configure the Desktop Client and Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services) and manage applications.

segment.source: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Overview
segment.target: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Overview

segment.source: Provides general information about the tasks you can perform by using the Virtualization Client Management Console.
segment.target: Provides general information about the tasks you can perform by using the Virtualization Client Management Console.

segment.source: How to Perform General Administrative Tasks in the Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Perform General Administrative Tasks in the Client Management Console

segment.source: Provides procedures that you can use to set up the Publishing Server and to refresh applications.
segment.target: Provides procedures that you can use to set up the Publishing Server and to refresh applications.

segment.source: How to Manage Applications in the Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Manage Applications in the Client Management Console

segment.source: Provides procedures that you can use to manage applications.
segment.target: Provides procedures that you can use to manage applications.

segment.source: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Configure the Client in the Application Virtualization Client Management Console

segment.source: Provides procedures that you can use to configure Desktop Client and Client for Remote Desktop Services.
segment.target: Provides procedures that you can use to configure Desktop Client and Client for Remote Desktop Services.

segment.target: How to Manually Manage Applications in the Client Management Console

segment.target: Provides procedures that you can use to manually manage applications.
